name: Another Ordinary Pong Game
description:
A completely normal pong game unless the other player cheated. If the other player did cheat watch out for the paddle dodging trick. also remember witch ball is real. Use arrow keys, or touch to move. Another fun game made by Thor 2020.

The original publication can be found at https://simmer.io/@A_Thor/another-ordinary-pong-game ,This is just a re upload of an old game
